00015 // BasicHandler
00016 class BasicHandler {
00017 public:
00018     friend lsf::basic::TestCase;
00019     static const size_t MAX_REDO_COUNT = 3;
00020     static const size_t DEF_SESSION_TIMEOUT = 2 * 1000;
00021     static const size_t DEF_SESSION_HTTP_TIMEOUT = 10 * 1000;
00022 
00023 public:
00024     virtual ~BasicHandler() { }
00025     void SetMsgType(msg::ENCSType msg_type) { _cs_rsp_type = msg_type; }
00026     void SetMsgType(msg::ENSSType msg_type) { _ss_rsp_type = msg_type; }
00027 
00028 public:
00029     // main logic
00030     void GetServerResponse(Session& session, msg::SS const& message);
00031     void WaitResponseTimeout(Session& session);
00032     void GetClientRequest(Session& session, msg::CS const& message);
00033     void GetServerRequest(Session& session, msg::SS const& message);
00034     void GetCurlResult(Session& session, bool result, std::string&& content);
00035 
00036 protected:
00037     // state machine
00038     void RunStateMachine(Session& session);
00039     virtual data::ENSessionState OnClientRequest(Session& session);
00040     virtual data::ENSessionState OnServerRequest(Session& session);
00041     virtual data::ENSessionState OnHttpSvrMessage(Session& session);
00042     virtual data::ENSessionState OnHttpSvrTimeout(Session& session);
00043     virtual data::ENSessionState OnConfSvrMessage(Session& session);
00044     virtual data::ENSessionState OnConfSvrTimeOut(Session& session);
00045     virtual data::ENSessionState OnCurlMessage(Session& session);
00046     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrNext(Session& session);
00047     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrQuery(Session& session);
00048     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrQueryMessage(Session& session);
00049     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrQueryTimeout(Session& session);
00050     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrQuerySuccess(Session& session);
00051     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrUpdate(Session& session);
00052     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrUpdateMessage(Session& session);
00053     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrUpdateTimeout(Session& session);
00054     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrUpdateSuccess(Session& session);
00055     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrInsert(Session& session);
00056     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrInsertMessage(Session& session);
00057     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrInsertTimeout(Session& session);
00058     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrInsertSuccess(Session& session);
00059     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrDelete(Session& session);
00060     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrDeleteMessage(Session& session);
00061     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrDeleteTimeout(Session& session);
00062     virtual data::ENSessionState OnDBSvrDeleteSuccess(Session& session);
00063     virtual void OnSessionFinish(Session& session);
00064 
00065 protected:
00066     void AddQueryData(Session& session, data::ENDataType data_type, uint64_t data_id);
00067     void AddQueryDataAndLock(Session& session, data::ENDataType data_type, uint64_t data_id);
00068     void AddDeleteData(Session& session, data::ENDataType data_type, uint64_t data_id);
00069     data::DB* AddInsertData(Session& session, data::ENDataType data_type, uint64_t data_id);
00070     bool SendResponse(Session& session);
00071 
00072     // must followed by return data::SESSION_STATE_CURL_WAIT;
00073     bool RequestUrl(Session& session, std::string const& url, std::string const& body = "");
00074 
00075 private:
00076     bool QueryData(Session& session, data::DBHandle const& db_handle);
00077     bool SetErrorResponse(Session& session, msg::ENError error);
00078     bool SetErrorResponse(Session& session, msg::ENInternalError error);
00079     bool SetSessionTimer(Session& session, uint64_t milli_second);
00080 
00081 protected:
00082     msg::ENCSType _cs_rsp_type = msg::CS_TYPE_NONE;
00083     msg::ENSSType _ss_rsp_type = msg::SS_TYPE_NONE;
00084 };
